passage.title: The day before yesterday
passage.paragraph: Mark is a good student in school. But he is not clean. His face and hands are often dirty.
One morning, Mark goes to school. His teacher looks at him ad says, "Mark, I know what you eat for breakfast."
"Bread," says his teacher, "your face and mouth tell me that."
"No, sir," Mark says. "Not today or yesterday, but the day before yesterday."
